article_title: Lessons learned in Minnesota: Republicans should shutdown the shutdown

article_metadata.description: In 2011, the longest state government shutdown in the history of Minnesota happened, lasting 20 days. Republican majorities in both the Minnesota Senate and House faced off against Gov. Mark Dayton, a Democrat.

og.description: The same dynamic will play out for the Republicans nationally in 2013 as it did for Republicans in the Minnesota shutdown in 2011.
og.title: Lessons learned in Minnesota: Republicans should shutdown the shutdown
